meanings.definition: To think that something is valuable or important.
examples: Teachers appreciate that students want to do their best on projects.

images.alt: Drawing of a younger man with his arm around the shoulders of an older man.
images.description: An older man leans forward. A younger man has his arm around the older man's shoulders.
images.caption: A grandfather appreciates his grandson's help.

examples: He hesitated to approach the dark, spooky house.

images.alt: Photo of an insect and a flower.
images.description: An insect is flying toward a bright flower.
images.caption: An insect approaches a bright flower.

meanings.definition: To back away, especially from danger.
examples: The general ordered the army to retreat from the battle.

meanings.definition: Being the only one of its kind.
examples: The Earth is unique because it is the only planet known to have human life.

images.alt: Photo of many white balls and one red ball.
images.description: A photo of many white balls and one red ball.
images.caption: The red ball is unique because the other balls are white.

meanings.definition: A sound made by the voice or throat to express something.
examples: Singing is a way humans use vocalization to tell a story.

images.alt: Photo of an animal with its head raised to the sky and mouth opened.
images.description: An animal with its head raised to the sky and mouth opened.
images.caption: A wolf vocalizing by howling.

meanings.definition: Reluctant to do or say something.
examples: Raul was hesitant to try a food that he wasn't sure he would like.

meanings.definition: An animal that hunts, kills, and eats other animals in order to survive.
examples: Dogs, wolves and coyotes are all predators and use the animals they kill for food.

images.description: A lion with long, light brown fur around its head. Image credit: Clement Bardot on Wikimedia Commons. This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 4.0 International license.
images.caption: Lions and other predators hunt other animals for food.

meanings.definition: To try very hard to deal with a challenge or problem.
examples: I struggled to swim across the pool because I am not a good swimmer.
Before the test, Marco looked around anxiously.

meanings.definition: To connect one thing with another in the mind.
examples: I associate howling with the sound a dog makes.
